HDG.W.content: what is more truly worthy [of poet’s thought, of thought] than word’s being veiling itself, the fading word for the word > oldest word for rule of word: logos—the same word, word for Saying, is word for Being, the presencing of beings

HDG.W.content: in order to fittingly follow element worthy of thought (as it gives itself to poetry [is that the key distinction?]) : abandon everything which we have now said to oblivion

HDG.FS.content: destiny of being (Geschick des Seins), will we be able to think it on its own terms [arrival]?: the task of thinking (Aufgabe des Denkens), which poetry is “heilsame Gefahr (wholesome danger)”: poetry has been faithful to site (Stätte) of inceptual upsurge (ursprünglichen Auf-gehens) [philosophy less faithful?]

HDG.DL.content: explanation (Erläuterung) of hermeneutics may issue (versteht) in a discussion (Erörterung) [Trakl essay] > hermenuein to hermeneus to Hermes (playful thought more compelling than rigor of sense): divine messenger, brings message of destiny (Botschaft des Geschickes) > hermeneuein: explanation that brings tidings (Kunde), can listen to a message > Plato’s Ion: poets “are interpreters (hermenes) of gods” > hermeneutics not just interpretation but the bearing (das Bringen) of message/tidings

HDG.LP.content: every great poet creates poetry from one single poetic statement (Gedicht), only > his greatness measured by the way he commits (anvertraut) to this singleness (Einzigen) so to keep (halten) his Sage wholly w/in it

HDG.LP.content: poet’s statement remains unspoken, from its site rise waves, moving the Saying, each wave causes movement of Saying to flow back into ever more hidden source (verhüllteren Ursprung) > from metaphysical-aesthetic point of view: the site/source of wave holds (birgt) w/in hidden nature of what first appears as rhythm

HDG.LP.content: [Heidegger discusses the relation btwn clarification (Erläuterung) of poem and discussion (Erörterung)] to discuss must pass through clarification, any right clarification [another version of authenticity] presupposes discussion: thinking dialogue (denkende Zwiesprache) w/ Gedicht remains (verharrt) w/in reciprocity (Wechselbezug) btwn clarification/discussion > only poetic dialogue w/ Gedicht is true dialogue: poetic conversation (Gespräch) btwn poets

HDG.LP.content: thinking dialogue w/ poetry always risks interfering w/ Sage of Gedicht, rather than letting it sing from its proper peace (eigenen Ruhe) > Erörterung of Gedicht can never substitute (ersetzen) or guide (leiten) our listening (Hören) to the poem, can make our Hören more thought-provoking/reflective (besinnlicher) [prosthesis, substitute]

HDG.LP.content: poet only becomes poet as he follows “madman” [stranger], calls to the brother who follows him [?] > friend’s face (Antlizt) looks into face of stranger: Augenblick [instant] of this glance moves the Sage of the listener

HDG.LP.content: Trakl’s path leads away from old degenerate generation (alten entarteten Geschlecht) to the unborn Geschlecht (in the earliness) > language of this poetry answers to the home-coming (Heimkehr) of the unborn Menschengeschlechtes > the poetic language stems (spricht) from this transition (Übergang) [differance?]: btwn decay & twilit blue of holy

HDG.LP.content: speaking from wandering of apartness, this language of poetry always speaks of what it leaves behind, what it parts from, and of that to which the departure submits (der Abschied sich bescheidet)
